ovdesc.p: AZ AZ.INTEREST.KEY This file is no more used. The info held here is maintained in INTEREST.KEY field in AZ.SCHEDULES.

AZ. INTEREST. KEY ACCOUNT. NO This field holds the account number/s for which Basic interest key has been defined. The grouping is done based on the key defined in RATE . KEY field of AZ Product Parameter (APP). This field is multi-valued internally by the system to hold more than one account IF ATTACHED to the same RATE. KEY.
Rate key should be defined in APP Accounts with FIXED rate don't form part of AZ. INTEREST. KEY accounts.
Key to this application. Should be a valid AZ Contract Id
